projectPlan: The project plan for introducing sustainable packaging material for walkers crisps in the Food & Beverages industry is as follows:
projectOverview: The goal of this project is to increase customers and sales by implementing sustainable packaging material for walkers crisps. The project will start on 2023-06-22 and end on 2025-08-29. The budget for this project is $100,000 USD.

workstreams.title: Research and Analysis
activities: Conduct market research on sustainable packaging materials
Analyze the current packaging materials used by walkers crisps
Identify potential sustainable packaging materials for walkers crisps

workstreams.title: Supplier Evaluation and Selection
activities: Identify potential suppliers of sustainable packaging materials
Evaluate and compare suppliers based on criteria such as cost, quality, and sustainability
Select the most suitable supplier for walkers crisps

workstreams.title: Implementation Plan
activities: Develop a detailed plan for implementing the new sustainable packaging material
Define the timeline and milestones for the implementation
Identify potential risks and mitigation strategies

caseStudies.title: Sustainable Packaging Implementation in Snack Industry
caseStudies.relevanceToProject: This case study provides insights into the successful implementation of sustainable packaging materials in the snack industry, which can be applied to the walkers crisps project.

caseStudies.title: Consumer Response to Sustainable Packaging
caseStudies.relevanceToProject: This case study explores the impact of sustainable packaging on consumer perception and purchasing behavior, which is relevant to the goal of increasing customers and sales for walkers crisps.
